name: A Book Full of Cards
description:
A Book Full of Cards is a uni project.

This Game is currently only available in it's earliest Alpha, therefore there is no Tutorial, some mechanics are missing and none of the graphics are final. This is a raw prototype.

I'm thankful for everyone playing and I would ask you to fill out this form after finishing the game

HOW TO PLAY:

Click "Play" -> Click "Dog"

You have to click the Event card in the middle of the screen.

At the bottom you can see your resource cards. The Options revealed by the Event will tell you how they affect your resources and game. No text means no effect.

Your goal is to befriend with the selcted Characters (Dog, Joel (Joel get's unlocked after befriending Dog))

You will have to make the right decisions to proceed in befrieding the characters and you need certain resources to fulfill  their final task.

If you have more than 8+ Cards, 4+ Guilt (red cards) or no Spirit(green cards), you will encounter special bad events. Those events should be avoided under all costs as they can knock you out of the game easily.

Resources:

Green - Spirit

Yellow - Money

Confidence - Purple

Guilt - Red
